VDBMS-0.0.0: A variational database management system

Safe HaskellNone
LanguageHaskell2010

VDB.Schema

Description

Variational database schemas.

Synopsis

  • type RowType = [Opt (Attribute, Type)]
  • type Schema = Opt (Map Relation (Opt RowType))
  • featureModel :: Schema -> FeatureExpr
  • lookupRowType :: Relation -> Schema -> Maybe (Opt RowType)

Documentation

type RowType = [Opt (Attribute, Type)] #

Type of a relation in the database.

type Schema = Opt (Map Relation (Opt RowType)) #

A schema is a mapping from relations to row types. Both the map itself and each row type are optionally included. The top-level Opt corresponds to the feature model, which defines the set of valid configurations.

featureModel :: Schema -> FeatureExpr #

The feature model associated with a schema.

lookupRowType :: Relation -> Schema -> Maybe (Opt RowType) #

Get the type of a relation in the database.
